display_information.name: Bamboozled Puzzle Bot
display_information.description: A puzzle game bot with weekly challenges, AI-powered answer validation, and dynamic personality based on your performance
display_information.long_description:
Bamboozled is an interactive puzzle game bot that brings weekly puzzle challenges to your Slack workspace. Features include:

• Weekly rotating puzzles with visual challenges
• AI-powered natural language answer validation
• Personal statistics and leaderboards
• Dynamic bot personality that evolves based on your performance
• Celebration GIFs for correct answers
• Streak tracking and mood tier progression

Use slash commands to view puzzles, check leaderboards, and track your stats. Submit answers via direct message to the bot!

slash_commands.usage_hint: Type /puzzle to see the current week's puzzle
Type /bamboozled to see the current week's puzzle
Type /leaderboard to see who's winning this week
Type /stats to see your solve count, streak, and more
Type /alltime to see the top solvers of all time

slash_commands.description: Check the bot's current mood toward you
slash_commands.usage_hint: Type /botmood to see your current tier and progress

slash_commands.usage_hint: Type /help to learn how to play Bamboozled

slash_commands.description: Rotate to the next puzzle (testing only)
slash_commands.usage_hint: Type /nextweek to activate the next puzzle
